quote: The two most powerful warriors are patience and time.
author: Leo Tolstoy

quote: Time is money.
author: Benjamin Franklin

quote: Time waits for no one.
author: Traditional Proverb

quote: Time is free, but it’s priceless. You can’t own it, but you can use it. You can’t keep it, but you can spend it. Once you’ve lost it you can never get it back.
author: Harvey Mackay

quote: The trouble is, you think you have time.
author: Jack Kornfield

quote: Time is a cruel thief to rob us of our former selves. We lose as much to life as we do to death.
author: Elizabeth Forsythe Hailey

quote: Suspect each moment, for it is a thief, tiptoeing away with more than it brings.
author: John Updike

quote: Time brings all things to pass.
author: Aeschylus

quote: Time flies over us, but leaves its shadow behind.
author: Nathaniel Hawthorne

quote: Regret for wasted time is more wasted time.
author: Mason Cooley

quote: You can’t make up for lost time. You can only do better in the future.
author: Ashley Ormon

quote: How did it get so late so soon?
author: Dr. Seuss

quote: Yesterday’s the past, tomorrow’s the future, but today is a gift. That’s why it’s called the present.
author: Bil Keane

quote: The common man is not concerned about the passage of time, the man of talent is driven by it.
author: Arthur Schopenhauer

quote: They always say time changes things, but you actually have to change them yourself.
author: Andy Warhol

quote: There are two days in my calendar: This day and that Day.
author: Martin Luther

quote: We must use time wisely and forever realize that the time is always ripe to do right.
author: Nelson Mandela

quote: Time changes everything except something within us which is always surprised by change.
author: Thomas Hardy

quote: Time is an illusion.
author: Albert Einstein

quote: The future is something which everyone reaches at the rate of sixty minutes an hour, whatever he does, whoever he is.
author: C.S. Lewis

quote: We all have our time machines. Some take us back, they’re called memories. Some take us forward, they’re called dreams.
author: Jeremy Irons

quote: Old Time, that greatest and longest established spinner of all! His factory is a secret place, his work is noiseless, and his hands are mutes.
author: Charles Dickens

quote: Time is the wisest counselor of all.
author: Pericles

quote: Punctuality is the thief of time.
author: Oscar Wilde

quote: The key is in not spending time, but in investing it.
author: Stephen R. Covey

quote: It is the time you have wasted for your rose that makes your rose so important.
author: Antoine de Saint-Exupéry

quote: Time is the most valuable thing a man can spend.
author: Theophrastus

quote: Better three hours too soon than a minute too late.
author: William Shakespeare

quote: Never leave till tomorrow that which you can do today.
author: Benjamin Franklin

quote: Your time is limited, so don't waste it living someone else's life.
author: Steve Jobs

quote: Life, if well lived, is long enough.
author: Seneca

quote: For the Present is the point at which time touches eternity.
author: C.S. Lewis

quote: A man who dares to waste one hour of life has not discovered the value of life.
author: Charles Darwin

quote: Time is more valuable than money. You can get more money, but you cannot get more time.
author: Jim Rohn

quote: I never think of the future. It comes soon enough.
author: Albert Einstein

quote: Time and the hour run through the roughest day.
author: William Shakespeare

quote: One can find time for everything if one is never in a hurry.
author: Mikhail Bulgakov

quote: To me every hour of the light and dark is a miracle, every cubic inch of space is a miracle.
author: Walt Whitman

quote: Time is the moving image of eternity.
author: Plato

quote: Time is a created thing. To say 'I don't have time' is like saying, 'I don't want to.'
author: Lao Tzu

quote: Time is the fire in which we burn.
author: Delmore Schwartz

quote: Time is a river which carries me along, but I am the river.
author: Jorge Luis Borges

quote: Time is a brisk wind, for each hour it brings something new.
author: Paracelsus

quote: Time is a great healer, but a poor beautician.
author: Lucille S. Harper

quote: Time is a great storyteller.
author: Irish Proverb

quote: Time is a created thing.
author: Lao Tzu

quote: Time is a companion that goes with us on a journey.
author: Jean-Luc Picard

quote: Time is a river without banks.
author: Marc Chagall

quote: Time is a great revealer.
author: Japanese Proverb

quote: Time is the justice that examines all offenders.
author: William Shakespeare

quote: Time is the soul of this world.
author: Pythagoras

quote: Time is the devourer of all things.
author: Ovid

quote: Time is a file that wears and makes no noise.
author: English Proverb

quote: Time is a great master; the problem is that it kills its pupils.
author: Hector Berlioz

quote: Time is a great teacher.
author: French Proverb

quote: Time is a physician that heals every grief.
author: Diphilus

quote: Time is a great manager.
author: Amelia Barr

quote: Time is the friend of the wonderful company, the enemy of the mediocre.
author: Warren Buffett

quote: Time is the most precious gift in our possession, for it is the most irrevocable.
author: Dietrich Bonhoeffer

quote: Time is the substance from which I am made.
author: Jorge Luis Borges

quote: Time is a storm in which we are all lost.
author: William Carlos Williams

quote: Time is the longest distance between two places.
author: Tennessee Williams

quote: Time is the moving image of eternity.
author: Plato

quote: Time is the wisest of all counselors.
author: Plutarch

quote: Time is a great equalizer.
author: Unknown

quote: Time is a great master; the problem is that it kills its pupils.
author: Hector Berlioz

quote: Time is a great story teller.
author: Irish Proverb

quote: Time is a river that sweeps me along, but I am the river.
author: Jorge Luis Borges

author: English Proverb

quote: Time is a great revealer.
author: Japanese Proverb

quote: Time is a companion that goes with us on a journey.
author: Jean-Luc Picard

author: Irish Proverb

quote: Time is a river that sweeps me along, but I am the river.
author: Jorge Luis Borges

author: Lucille S. Harper

author: French Proverb

quote: Time is a river without banks.
author: Marc Chagall

quote: Time is a great revealer.
author: Japanese Proverb

quote: Time is a companion that goes with us on a journey.
author: Jean-Luc Picard

quote: Time is a great story teller.
author: Irish Proverb
